title: Beggin
lyrics: Oooh Put your loving hand out, baby Beggin, beggin you Put your loving hand out baby Beggin, beggin you Put your loving hand out darling Ridin high, when I was king Played it hard and fast, cause I had everything Walked away, won me then But easy come and easy go And I hope that my heart gets fed, matter of fact girl im beggin.. I want to paint in a picture telling where we could be at You can give it the away, you had it and you took the pay Keep also home, cause I don`t want to live in a broken home, girl I am begging
